title: Why the Rent vs. Buy Debate Isn't Winning for Anyone
subtitle: Discover a New Way to Earn Rewards on Housing Expenses
content:
Rent vs. Buy Debate: Who Really Wins?

You know who wins the rent versus buy debate? Nobody, and here's why.

Renters think they're winning because they're flexible and have no annual maintenance costs. Homeowners think they're winning because they're building equity and don't have to deal with a landlord. Meanwhile, both of you are writing massive checks every single month and getting absolutely nothing back for it, until now.

Introducing BILT

BILT is a membership program built around your biggest expense, your home. BILT earns you rewards that can be applied towards flights, hotels, dining, and my personal favorite, SoulCycle classes.

The BILT Credit Cards

Even better, BILT just launched three brand new credit cards:

  • BILT Blue: If you want to keep it simple and you're new to the world of credit cards.
  • BILT Obsidian: If you're like me and spend more on food each month than you care to admit as a personal finance creator.
  • BILT Palladium: The premium card that helps you keep everything in one place and can earn you points across housing, travel, and life.

So whether you rent or own, it doesn't matter because now we can all be rewarded. Go to BILT.com/card to learn more. And let me know in the comments which side of the debate you're on.
